section.name: What is this?
section.p: This is the maven site for the ocelot component of Zebra and Antelope
Ocelot is a a tomcat filter to prevent users having more than one http request at at time. This behaviour is ONLY suitable for some applications and in a general website would be a very bad idea

section.name: Known Issues
section.p: See issuezilla for known issues with ocelot

section.name: Future Plans
section.p: This may be extended to support multiple browser windows using some kind of window session using URL rewriting
